body.name: AWEI Loud Bluetooth Speakers, 40W Deep Bass Portable Wireless Speaker, Build-in MIC, IPX7 Waterproof with Dynamic RGB Light, Outdoor Bluetooth Speaker Via Bluetooth 5.3/3.5mm Aux-in/TF Card Connection

features: 【40W ASTONISHING SOUND AND RGB LIGHTS】--AWEI loud wireless Bluetooth speaker with subwoofer, tweeters and a large passive radiator to deliver incredible sound without any distortion, even at maximum volume. The dynamic with 11 colorful LED light mode show will groove to the music beats and occupy your field of vision to light up a hot party.

【80W SUPER STEREO PAIRING】-- Easy pairing of two portable bluetooth speakers to create both left and right channel systems go crazy, the 80W ultra-stereo surround sound immediately invades your hearing, and your heart beats wildly with the double bass sound.

【BLUETOOTH 5.3 & BUILD IN MIC】-- Embedded with a Bluetooth 5.3 high-performance chip, supports a connection range of up to 33 feet and provides a more stable and faster connection. AWEI wireless speaker is compatible with any Bluetooth-enabled devices. The built-in microphone makes your calls loud and clear, as if talking face-to-face.

【360°PARTY LIGHTS SHOW】-- Amazing dynamic 11 fantastic light shows, light up the fiery party and push the passion to a new level, the Bluetooth speaker gives you an accurate and sensitive pulsing light show that dances to the rhythm of the music type you play. Easily operate the light, just press the light button to open or switch between different lighting modes and the light is in your hands, and you can see the music!

【TAKE YOUR MUSIC OUTDOORS】-- The AWEI Bluetooth speaker is designed for the ultimate outdoor listening experience. Its lightweight and portable design makes it perfect for travel, backyard parties, camping, and hiking. With an IPX7 certification, this speaker is splash proof and rainproof. Whether you're enjoying a day at the beach or hiking in the rain, the AWEI has got you covered. Plus, it makes for a great gift for any occasion, whether it's your friend's birthday or Mother's Day for Mom.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Party Connect Pair two speakers and enjoy sounds twice as loud while controlling them via a single device. Enjoy Powerful Sound Anywhere The AWEI speaker louder to the beach, make you the most dazzling singing star at the party. Lightweight design with an easy to carry strap This Portable speaker includes a lanyard, is a compact, lightweight that is easy to carry, you can easily attach to your bike, backpack, or anywhere else you want. The ultimate companion for all your adventure Experience crystal clear sound anywhere you go with our portable Bluetooth speaker.Compact and lightweight, it's the perfect companion for all your travels.

Previous page Rainbow Light Show Speakers are not just for playtime music, they also come in a variety of stylish colors IPX7 Waterproof Speaker IPX7 Waterproof. Whether it's a pool party, or beach, it will be bring you a adventure companion. 3000mAh Power Bank Power on the go. The built-in power bank is emergency home or outdoor backup to change your phone. Hands-Free Calling The built-in mic lets you enjoy hands-free calling straight through your speaker. Fast and Stable Links Bluetooth 5.3 offers a reliable and fast connection to paired devices within 100 feet. Next page 1 RGB Light Show 2 IPX7 Waterproof 3 Build-in Powerbank 4 Hands-Free Call 5 Bluetooth 5.3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired this Bluetooth speaker, and its performance has genuinely impressed me. The sound quality is commendable, delivering clear and well-balanced audio. Surprisingly loud, it holds its own in various settings without compromising on clarity.In terms of value for money, it stands out. It doesn't claim to be a premium speaker, but for its price, it exceeds expectations. It's a practical choice for anyone looking for a straightforward Bluetooth speaker that offers decent sound without a hefty price tag. I appreciate its unassuming design and consistent ability to produce good audio. In my experience, it deserves a solid five stars for its honest performance and affordability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sound and cool lights.
reviews.reviewText: I got this product to be able to play music wherever I need to. The sound quality it good and it has a good level of volume as well. The charge lasts for a while and it warns you multiple times before it is going to die.It is a big speaker but it is still portable and fits in my backpack. The lights are a cool bonus feature and add color to my room. Additionally, it is easy to connect my phone and computer to the speaker when I need to. It connects via bluetooth and it charges quick with usb-c.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality speaker
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this speaker. It was loud, colorful and is easy to connect to.The bass is good and the mids are perfect.An overall good speaker and the carrying strap is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Bluetooth speaker looks very beautiful,the size is just right,the sound quality is very good,and the connection is very stable.I like its ambient light very much,It can adjust a variety of lighting effects,It’s working very well so far. Recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The sound is so clear and the battery lasts forever!!! These are the two things I was more impressed about it. It’s definitely very good for the price and size! I bought I think three months ago and it’s still working fine. I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: was shocked at how much bass this little unit punched out. streamlined with a simple design that’s elegant enough to put on a shelf. great travel speaker. wish the battery life was longer capped out at a 5 hour charge. will have a constant chime every minute to remind you that the battery is low. feels very high quality and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Speaker Overall
reviews.reviewText: Great overall product and good value. The battery life is good and the lights on the front have a few different options and can also be turned off depending on your style. The sound is great and I like how the maximum volume is limited by the highest setting on either device. This means a kid can't turn it up any higher than the phone is set and similarly a phone at max volume is limited to the max volume set on the speaker. Anyone who has kids knows this is a handy feature.I also like the SD card slot option. I have not tried it yet as I need to find where I put my old mp3 files but I have no doubt it will work great and means it can be used without an accompanying device.My only gripe is with Bluetooth. It does not seem to be possible to "kick off" another device by holding the pairing button. If you want to switch you must have first device disconnect and then connect the second device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only thing is the battery does not last as long as I expected.
Volume was decent for its size....sound quality was ok.....but it definitely lacked the deep bass that was advertised. I returned it.
